hackathons.title: Scribble Pad Hackathon
hackathons.description: Built a Snake Game with an innovative twist on the classic Snake game, where players can control the snake using voice commands and hand gesture in addition to traditional keyboard controls.

hackathons.title: DeFy25
hackathons.description: Developed a blockchain based voting system for the college elections.

hackathons.title: Mission: Data Impossible
hackathons.description: Learned about data analysis and filtering, and also attended a CTF event focused on those topics.

hackathons.title: BIS Medihack 1.0
hackathons.description: Developed an AI-powered medical consultancy platform featuring appointment scheduling, live chat, and video conferencing with doctors.

hackathons.title: Summer of Scribbling 2025
hackathons.description: Developed MapItFlow to convert syllabus PDFs into interactive, AI-personalized learning roadmaps using HTML, CSS, JS, PDF.JS, and GeminiAPI. It features real-time progress tracking, intelligent study guidance, flexible data management, and a modern, responsive Tailwind CSS interface.
